short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick dictionary lookup using definitions provided by Jisho.org

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension allows you to quickly lookup the definition of any Japanese words directly from any webpage or looking up any English word's definition in Japanese. The definition of each word will be shown inside a small window alongside your current webpage so you can conveniently switch back into reading the content without having to open another tab or open another application to access dictionary. This extension uses Jisho.org's definition data via its public API
